meanings.definition: Conformity to moral and ethical principles; righteousness.
meanings.sent1: Her virtuousness shone through in her kind actions towards others.
meanings.sent2: His virtuousness was evident in the way he always helped those in need.
meanings.sent3: The virtuousness of the superhero's actions made the villains rethink their ways.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of deceit, her virtuousness was a beacon of light.
meanings.sent5: The virtuousness of the knight's code inspired all who knew him.

meanings.definition: The quality or practice of moral excellence or righteousness.
meanings.sent1: The community admired her virtuousness and honesty.
meanings.sent2: His virtuousness in always telling the truth earned him respect.
meanings.sent3: The virtuousness of the detective's methods led to some comical misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: Her virtuousness was like a shield against the temptations of the world.
meanings.sent5: The virtuousness of his character was unmatched in the entire kingdom.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being virtuous.
meanings.sent1: The purity of her virtuousness was admired by all who knew her.
meanings.sent2: His virtuousness was a guiding light in times of darkness.
meanings.sent3: The virtuousness of the cat's behavior brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: In a world of chaos, his virtuousness was a calming presence.
meanings.sent5: The virtuousness of the tree's shade provided comfort to all who sought it.
